parsed.o: relating activity to half-life and the number of nuclei
evidence: These questions are designed to help you practice the core ideas we learned today: calculating radioactivity from decay counts, relating activity to half-life and the number of nuclei, analyzing how the signal-to-noise ratio changes with dose and scan time, and modeling the technetium generator with parent-daughter decay equations.
